name: Reservoir Airspace
description:
Reservoir Airspace

Within this wonderous adventure, you play as a goldfish that must survive through waves of sharks and pufferfish that attack you. Your goal as the player is to avoid and destroy as many enemies as you can before you lose all three lives. Enemies spawn in waves, and only once they have all been destroyed will another wave generate.

Control:

Forward - W

Turn - A & D

Shoot - Space

Pause - Esc & P

Team:

Gavin - Programming (Tech Lead)

Zach - Programming

Madeline - Art (Game Director)

Makayla - Art (Art Lead)

Henry - Audio (Audio Lead)

Luc - Audio
